org.dyn4j.collision.narrowphase

Class Raycast

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.dyn4j.collision.narrowphase.Raycast

  • public class Raycast
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents the result of a Ray cast against a Convex Shape.
    Since:
    2.0.0
    Version:
    3.0.2
    Author:
    William Bittle
